title: The Birth of a Nation became controversial - why

content.question: D. W. Griffith’s epic film The Birth of a Nation (1915) became controversial because of its

choices.label: portrayal of the Sons of Liberty as a radical mob
celebration of American freedoms at a time of protest against radical groups
depiction of Ku Klux Klan activities as heroic and commendable
sympathetic treatment of Germany in the years before the First World War

content.answer: depiction of Ku Klux Klan activities as heroic and commendable
